release.description: First release from funfried (previous releases can be found here https://github.com/geertjanw/eclipsecodeformatter_for_netbeans)
release.action: Renamed the project from "Eclipse Java Code Formatter for NetBeans" to "External Java Code Formatters for NetBeans" because of adding Google Code Formatter
Removed default formatter action and added shortcut (Ctrl + Meta/Cmd + F) for external formatter action
Support for guarded documents (documents that are created by the NetBeans GUI builder, guarded blocks are skipped of course, but everything in between can be formatted)
Switched from ANT to Maven project
